AboutMe.introduction: I'm a Frontend engineer with over 9 years of experience, specialized in building web applications using ReactJs with best practices.
AboutMe.hobbies: When I'm not coding, you can find me playing badmintton, climbing, or playing boardgames.

Banner.intro: Senior frontend engineer with a passion for creating user-centric and functional web applications

ContactPage.description1: 10 years in the world of web development, currently on ReactJS
ContactPage.description2: I consider that the framework or the programming language is a tool that must be adapted according to the context.
ContactPage.description3: What motivates me the most is the feeling of creativity and accomplishment when developing a product.
ContactPage.descriptionGlobal: Let's connect and discuss how my background and your needs can align to create outstanding results!
ContactPage.githubDescription: Browse though my GitHub repositories to see unfinished projects and the source code of this website.
ContactPage.linkedinDescription: Connect with me on LinkedIn to learn more about my professional experience and projects.
